title: Fit Wiz for use with FITBIT®
creator: Brilliant Luck

extendedInfo.description: Steps Challenge Page!Designed for use with the FITBITÂ® platform!Syncs with FITBITÂ® online account!For use with FITBITÂ® fitbitNew Daily Goal Dashboard for the last week!Able to Log Activities to Fitbit.comFitbit low battery, phone notification! Checks every 15 minutes and produces a phone notification if the battery is low!Retrieve Steps, Calories, Sleep and much more! Tracks steps and time for activities performed while using a Fitbit!

reviews.title: No BT sync.
reviews.comment: Why install another app in my bloated phone if it won\'t do anything else for me? Please Fitbit release YOUR app to the rest of the world.
reviews.author: Andr\303\251 Moraes

reviews.title: Crash and Burn
reviews.comment: App does what it\'s supposed to but always locks up on the actual day that is set to end its measuring (eg if you are tracking for one month, on the last day of that month it crashes and force closes). Unfortunately I\'m done with it.
reviews.author: Ron Gallo

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Please enable enter steps  for walking & not just miles/kms and also enable favoriting activities via the app. How about incorporating a built-in step counter as well, that will automatically update to Fitbit account?
reviews.author: Patrizia Elisabeth Schwartz

reviews.title: No link...
reviews.comment: As already mentioned, it doesn\'t link. You keep getting sent back to.the authorize page over and over. Will update my rating when i can actually use it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not sync with FitBit
reviews.comment: Per comments it looked like the app would read FitBit info without needing to use FitBit basr station attached to computer.  App does not so is no more useful than the FitBit app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad program
reviews.comment: Wouldn\'t let me connect to fitbit account.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fitbit rocks
reviews.comment: Useless. Can not track as it only receive history, make it a more usefull apps. Give you 5 status...  Enabled it to fetch data direct from my flex, ultra, one and zip as Fitbit is discriminating users in other countries by not enabling apps in New Zealand, Indonesia for example.
reviews.author: Teddy Halim

reviews.title: Bad bad bad
reviews.comment: Get the thing working before deploying it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: I enjoy logging in other activities I\'m doing on the go. Makes using fitbit extra fun...!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Don\'t work very well
reviews.author: Talal Nasr

reviews.title: Bril
reviews.comment: Fab...
reviews.author: Wendy Farquhar

reviews.title: Linking works samsung strat
reviews.comment: I had to try a couple of times. Got stuck at website.  3rd time after exiting website after 2nd try, I had saved my usn/psw.  So 3rd time, I just hit apply and it went from browser to fit bit and I was all linked up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good not great
reviews.comment: Extremely basic. Works without issues on my HTC Amaze but overall, its nothing to write home about in my opinion.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Start
reviews.comment: Basic. Features I\'d like to see: default screen, similar color scheme and icons like Fitbit website, set favorite activities to pin them on top.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t link
reviews.comment: I have yet to be able to link the app with my fitbit account. App is worthless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Blah
reviews.comment: Wont link with fitbit account.  Fail.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked great
reviews.comment: HTC evo 3d
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Food logging
reviews.comment: Would be a huge plus!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: It\'s a start!  Food logging would be nice but I use My Fitness Pal so that works for now.
reviews.author: A Google User
